content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response recommending the 'google' command to search for information on a topic, and I ran the command with the argument 'query': "how to make a pizza". My computer returned a list of URLs related to the topic as an action result. Additionally, I received a message to execute Python code with the argument 'code': "print('Hello, World!')" and 'basename': "hello_world". My computer responded with the action result: "Hello, World!" printed.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some text to write to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is some text to write to the new file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "\\nThis is some additional text to add to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "old_text": "some additional", "new_text": "some new", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/new_file.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'5cb6d9a1-a644-47b4-bd1c-c3e7d0255149.jpg\\nAtlas\\nREADME.md\\namnesty_international_article.txt\\natlas.json\\natlas.settings.yaml\\natlas.yaml\\nce861065-b194-46cd-8b48-c0b1615196e2.jpg\\nd3c3ac33-5833-4cc8-b9db-de0136d4bc27.jpg\\ndalle_image_generator.py\\ndalle_image_prompt.txt\\nexample.txt\\nfile_logger.txt\\ngenerate_image.py\\ngenerated_images.txt\\nimages\\nimgcat\\nleague_of_legends_bot.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_controls.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_development.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_gpt3.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_machine_learning.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_opencv.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_pyautogui.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_pygame.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_pytesseract.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_riot_api.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_riot_games_api.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_selenium.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_tensorflow.txt\\nleague_of_legends_bot_web_interface.txt\\nmy_script.py\\nperceptron.py\\nperceptron_results.txt\\nperceptron_training.csv\\nredis_example.py\\nriot_games_api.txt\\nriot_games_api_key.txt\\nriot_games_api_usage.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to make a pizza"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.abcya.com/games/pizza", "https://tasty.co/recipe/pizza-dough", "https://cooking.nytimes.com/guides/1-how-to-make-pizza",
